products.name: auto-shovel
products.description: Will shovel for you. Snow has never been funner--or lighter. Perfect x-mas gift for colder climates.

products.name: winter sandals
products.description: Will keep your feet toasty in cold times. Will melt snow at a two inch radius. Stop using if your feet turn black.

products.name: self-repairing cake
products.description: Will make itself whole. Great for the holidays. If used according to guidelines, will render up to 50 servings per day, for up to a whole week of festivities. Wait at least 10 minutes between servings.

products.name: monster mania
products.description: A party in a box. Play your cards right, and you might get invited.

products.name: smoke screen
products.description: non permeable nano-thin screen, made of subzero diaphenous smoke particles. Perfect for confusing onlookers.

products.name: cloning device
products.description: clone your favorite pet, your favorite parent, your favorite child. Do so in the comfort and secrecy of your own home, for the pleasure and amusement of those you love.

products.name: biolin
products.description: a violin made of live tissue, created to combine the melodic enchantment of songbirds, the beauty of resonating strings, and the complexity of polymorphic engineering.

products.name: field mouse
products.description: A mouse that hunts, in the field, for you. Yield: 2 grams of locally grown seeds and/or shiny objects a day.

products.name: glitter an gold
products.description: looks like glitter, acts like gold.

products.name: shimmering
products.description: an adjective you can use anywhere you like. forever.

products.name: fur
products.description: it will grow on your winter-cold body and keep you warm

products.name: friendster
products.description: monthly subscription to a pocket-sized friend. Participate in this wonderful reabilitation program for convicts world-wide.
